metadata.title: W3Schools.com
metadata.Keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website
metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: HTML Iframes
An HTML iframe is used to display a web page within a web page.
content.html: An HTML iframe is used to display a web page within a web page.

content.text: HTML Iframe Syntax
The HTML <iframe> tag specifies an inline frame.
content.html: The HTML <iframe> tag specifies an inline frame.

content.text: An inline frame is used to embed another document within the current HTML document.
content.html: An inline frame is used to embed another document within the current HTML document.

content.code_html: <iframe src="url" title="description"></iframe>

content.text: Tip: It is a good practice to always include a title attribute for the <iframe> . This is used by screen readers to read out what the content of the iframe is.
content.html: Tip: It is a good practice to always include a title attribute for the <iframe>. This is used by screen readers to read out what the content of the iframe is.

content.text: Iframe - Set Height and Width
Use the height and width attributes to specify the size of the iframe.
content.html: Use the height and width attributes to specify the size of the iframe.

content.text: The height and width are specified in pixels by default:
content.html: The height and width are specified in pixels by default:

content.code_html: <iframe src="demo_iframe.htm" height="200" width="300" title="Iframe Example"></iframe>

content.text: Or you can add the style attribute and use the CSS height and width properties:
content.html: Or you can add the style attribute and use the CSS height and width properties:

content.code_html: <iframe src="demo_iframe.htm" style="height:200px;width:300px;" title="Iframe Example"></iframe>

content.text: Iframe - Remove the Border
By default, an iframe has a border around it.
content.html: By default, an iframe has a border around it.

content.text: To remove the border, add the style attribute and use the CSS border property:
content.html: To remove the border, add the style attribute and use the CSS border property:

content.code_html: <iframe src="demo_iframe.htm" style="border:none;" title="Iframe Example"></iframe>

content.text: With CSS, you can also change the size, style and color of the iframe's border:
content.html: With CSS, you can also change the size, style and color of the iframe's border:

syntaxHighlighting.text:
<iframe src="demo_iframe.htm" style="border:2px solid red;" 
  title="Iframe Example">

src="demo_iframe.htm" style="border:2px solid red;" 
  title="Iframe Example"

content.code:
<iframe src="demo_iframe.htm" style="border:2px solid red;" 
title="Iframe Example"></iframe>

syntax_highlighting.text:
<iframe src="demo_iframe.htm" style="border:2px solid red;" 
  title="Iframe Example">

src="demo_iframe.htm" style="border:2px solid red;" 
  title="Iframe Example"

content.code_html: <iframe src="demo_iframe.htm" style="border:2px solid red;" title="Iframe Example"></iframe>

syntax_highlighting_data.text:
<iframe src="demo_iframe.htm" style="border:2px solid red;" 
  title="Iframe Example">

src="demo_iframe.htm" style="border:2px solid red;" 
  title="Iframe Example"

content.text: Iframe - Target for a Link
An iframe can be used as the target frame for a link.
content.html: An iframe can be used as the target frame for a link.

content.text: The target attribute of the link must refer to the name attribute of the iframe:
content.html: The target attribute of the link must refer to the name attribute of the iframe:

content.code: W3Schools.com
content.code_html:
<iframe src="demo_iframe.htm" name="iframe_a" title="Iframe Example"></iframe>

<p><a href="https://www.w3schools.com" target="iframe_a">W3Schools.com</a></p>

content.text: Chapter Summary
HTML iframe Tag
For a complete list of all available HTML tags, visit our HTML Tag Reference .
content.html: For a complete list of all available HTML tags, visit our HTML Tag Reference.
